scripts.wdio test:smoke: set ENV=test&& wdio run src/configs/wdio.conf.test.cjs --suite smoke
scripts.wdio test:regression: set ENV=test&& wdio run src/configs/wdio.conf.test.cjs --suite regression
scripts.wdio dev:smoke: set ENV=dev&& wdio run src/configs/wdio.conf.test.cjs --suite smoke
scripts.wdio dev:regression: set ENV=dev&& wdio run src/configs/wdio.conf.test.cjs --suite regression
